message: Name,

You are invited to our very first CLE Accredited Justia Webinar! On January 18 at 2:00pm ET/11:00am PT, JurisPro Expert Witness Directory President Jim Robinson will offer a virtual CLE and webinar opportunity on Finding and Researching Expert Witnesses* exclusively for Justia Connect members.
One hour of general California MCLE credit is offered as an exclusive Justia Connect Pro benefit. Other jurisdictions may award credit case-by-case through the self-submission process.
If you are not a Justia Connect Pro but wish to attend this webinar for CLE credit, you can upgrade to Pro for only $19.99/month at connect.justia.com/pro.
Not a Justia Connect Pro? You can still learn from a leader in expert witness research!
note: *This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

Hi Name,

You are registered for Finding and Researching Expert Witnesses* with JurisPro Expert Witness Directory President Jim Robinson on January 18 at 11:00am PT. Review the agenda here and don’t forget to mark your calendar for this can’t-miss presentation!

Reminder: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
bottomline: *This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

message: Hi Name,

We will see you in just a few short hours as JurisPro Expert Witness Directory President Jim Robinson explores best practices for Finding and Researching Expert Witnesses* with Justia Connect members.

The presentation will begin promptly at 11:00 a.m. PT. You should have received a unique Zoom link for this webinar. If you cannot locate your link, please contact Justia Support immediately for assistance.
Reminders:

All Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, but only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.

If you are a Justia Connect Pro seeking MCLE credit, your written materials are now available via the CLE center block in your Justia Connect dashboard. You must be present for the entirety of the webinar presentation. You must also complete attendance verification following the presentation. A code will be given during the webinar.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

You won’t want to miss our first MCLE Accredited Justia Webinar on January 18, 2023! JurisPro Expert Witness Directory President Jim Robinson is helping Justia Connect members sharpen their litigation skills in Finding and Researching Expert Witnesses.*
note: Alert: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive one hour of California general MCLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

bottomline: This presentation is approved for one hour of general California MCLE credit.
note: Alert: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
